name: Cargo Embargo
description:
Cargo Embargo, a game where you, the cargo driver have one important job, get the cargo to the goal. There is one problem in your way however, pirates. Not just any pirate, space pirates, they are a ferocious kind. You will have to survive their constant onslaught. One way to fight back better would be to upgrade your spacecraft.

Cargo Embargo is the final product of 8 days of work by the following people : 

Artist - Hannes Lissner

Artist - Max Niva

Programmer - Alexander Wahrenstedt

Programmer - Kristoffer Lissner

Programmer - Viktor Pedersen

Designer - Kim Romsri

Designer - Ludvig Stockhaus

QA - Tony Svalenström

QA - Ali Al Saidi
